sect1.title: Feedback
sect1.para: Do you have comments on any of the things mentioned in this article? Then head right over to the comment section and let us know!
Or if you would like to be part of the openSUSE:Weekly news team then check out our team page and join!
Or Communicate with or get help from the wider openSUSE community via IRC, forums, or mailing lists see Communicate.
You can subscribe to the openSUSE Weekly News RSS feed at news.opensuse.org.
